comment:
* Utilities for reading data from {@link ContentCaptureEvent} and {@link ViewNode}.
 *
 * @hide

methods.name: public static String getEventTextLower(@NonNull ContentCaptureEvent event)
methods.comment: Returns the lowercase text extracted from the {@link ContentCaptureEvent}, if set.

methods.name: public static String getViewNodeTextLower(@Nullable ViewNode viewNode)
methods.comment: Returns the lowercase text extracted from the {@link ViewNode}, if set.

methods.name: public static String getHintTextLower(@Nullable ViewNode viewNode)
methods.comment: Returns the lowercase hint text extracted from the {@link ViewNode}, if set.

methodNames: public static String getEventTextLower(@NonNull ContentCaptureEvent event)
public static String getViewNodeTextLower(@Nullable ViewNode viewNode)
public static String getHintTextLower(@Nullable ViewNode viewNode)
